pros: Everyone is a familiar face and it feels like a family. The culture is amazing!

pros: They were an amazing work family

job_title: Director of Marketing and Communications in Columbus, WI
pros: I feel the work environment is extremely positive here. All of my co-workers brighten my day. The pay is fair and so are the time off and benefits.
cons: Unfortunately, some employees who have been here a long time are of the old school mentality that you can never trust management. That is a poison that seeps throughout certain departments here. I feel the management team that we have now is great and people need to trust their judgement.
